thread.title: Monster Movers Opening New Family-Owned Moving Company Location on South Shore in Weymouth, MA
thread.title_full: Monster Movers Opening New Family-Owned Moving Company Location on South Shore in Weymouth, MA - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Monster Movers Opening New Family-Owned Moving Company Location on South Shore in Weymouth, MA
text:
Monster Movers
Professional, Organized and Affordable Mover opening new South Shore moving company serving Plymouth County MA
WEYMOUTH, Mass. , Oct. 5, Monster Movers , an award-winning local residential and long distance moving company founded in Boston 15 years ago, announced today that it has opened a new Boston moving branch location in Weymouth to service the South Shore-area of Massachusetts . The warehouse and office space is strategically located, and will provide improved access to Monster Movers's expanding customer base within the metro- Boston community. Monster Movers began as a local mover in Massachusetts and then national expansion in 2013 with the residents of Massachusetts and eventually major cities along the East Coast supporting Monster Movers. Monster Movers now operates over 10 offices in Massachusetts , Florida , South Carolina , North Carolina , Maryland , New Jersey , New York , Virginia , Connecticut , Rhode Island and Texas .
The company will dispatch several crews and vehicles daily from the new location in Weymouth , and will be supported by the company's national headquarters, located in Worcester, MA. Monster Movers built its reputation in Massachusetts by hiring local residents with families in the area that are committed to changing the moving industry by providing unprecedented levels of customer service for a reasonable price. A major part of the business is built on family and treating customers like they are part of the Monster Movers family. Training - online and at the company "training house" located in Worcester, MA is a huge part of the culture. Crew members must complete over 40 hours of safety training, customer relations, packing and general training before being able to join a crew.
Operations of the new Weymouth, MA warehouse will be supervised by Manager Steve Collins , a long-time crew member of Monster Movers. Collins started at Monster Movers over a decade ago, and has a long of history of professionalism, leadership, and customer satisfaction. Moves performed by Monster Movers in Weymouth , or anywhere else on the East Coast, can be booked today by visiting www.monstermovers.com or calling 877-470-1247.
About Monster Movers Moving and Storage :
https://youtu.be/RuFzslMjP6A
Founded in 1999, Boston -based moving company Monster Movers is an award winning local residential and long distance mover , offering local moving, long distance moving, packing, and storage services. Monster Movers has continued yearly growth of over 30% since 2012 backed by repeat customers and word-of-mouth referrals. Monster Movers moving company's services include moving, piano moving, complete packing and unpacking services, and other related services. Monster Movers offers storage facilities and dispatches crews from more than 10 offices as movers in Boston , movers in Providence , movers in Weymouth , movers in Andover , movers in Orlando , movers on Long Island , movers in Raleigh , movers in Charleston , movers in DC. For more information, please call 877-470-1247 or visit http://www.gentlegiant.com/ .
